entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lucky Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lucky Lake 09:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -31.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -34.7°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
